refnamediv.refpurpose: Simple debugging console for a Palm Handheld device [deprecated].

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: pilot-debugsh is a commandline interface to the Palm debug monitor. Use device file /dev/tty<0..n> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, pilot-debugsh will output a simple usage help message.

listitem.para: Returns the number of databases on the PDA card.
Returns the names of databases on the Palm.

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: The program will connect to your Palm handheld and give the user an interactive prompt (a "shell") for executing debugging commands.

refsect1.title: Reporting Bugs
refsect1.para: We have an online bug tracker. Using this is the only way to ensure that your bugs are recorded and that we can track them until they are resolved or closed. Reporting bugs via email, while easy, is not very useful in terms of accountability. Please point your browser to http://bugs.pilot-link.org and report your bugs and issues there.
